briefdescription.para: HillClimbing - class that implements the Hill Climbing metaheuristic.

memberdef.name: generate
memberdef.exceptions: throws IllegalArgumentException, SecurityException, ClassNotFoundException, InstantiationException, IllegalAccessException, InvocationTargetException, NoSuchMethodException

briefdescription.para: generate - generate a new state based on the current state and the operator number.

parameterdescription.para: the operator number to use for generating the new state

memberdef.name: updateReference
memberdef.exceptions: throws IllegalArgumentException, SecurityException, ClassNotFoundException, InstantiationException, IllegalAccessException, InvocationTargetException, NoSuchMethodException

briefdescription.para: updateReference - update the reference state if the candidate state is accepted.
getReferenceList - get the list of reference states.
setInitialReference - set the initial reference state.
getSonList - get the list of son states.
setTypeCandidate - set the type of candidate.
awardUpdateREF - award the update of the reference state if the candidate state is accepted.

simplesect.para: returns true if the update is awarded, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: getWeight - get the weight of the candidate.
setWeight - set the weight of the candidate.
getListCountBetterGender - get the list of counts of better candidates by gender.

simplesect.para: the list of counts of better candidates by gender

briefdescription.para: getListCountGender - get the list of counts of candidates by gender.

simplesect.para: the list of counts of candidates by gender

briefdescription.para: getTrace - get the trace of the candidate.
HillClimbing - class that implements the Hill Climbing metaheuristic.
